PartyProfileRisk.name: PartyProfileRisk
PartyProfileRisk.description: Represents information about the risk assessment done for a party.

ApplicantId.description: The applicant associated with the party profile risk.

IsRiskOverridden.description: Indicates whether the risk assessment result of the party was overridden.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the party profile risk record.

OverridenRiskCategory.description: Specifies the risk category that's overridden for a party after the assessment is complete.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile that's associated with the risk assessment.

RiskCategory.description: Specifies the risk category that's assigned to a party profile after the assessment is complete.

RiskOverriddenById.description: The user who overrode the risk assessment result of the party.

RiskOverrideReason.description: The reason for overriding the risk assessment result.

Type.description: Specifies the type of risk assessment.
